about_the_game:
You come home to find your fiancée in bed with another man. This event sparks a downward spiral which eventually leads to you losing your job and the life you've created.

Fortunately, the generosity of your beautiful cousin (Sophie) provides you refuge in another city. One night, while sleeping on her couch, inspiration arrives from the least likely of places. Under the guise of being gay, you manage to find employment at a gym that’s exclusive to women only.

Will you use this opportunity to satisfy the revenge in your heart or will you take the high road instead?

Key Features:

  • Open World Sandbox: Explore the multiple locations populated by the main love interests as well as minor characters. See how their daily routines become more lewd as your corruption gains more influence.
  • Various Body Types: The girls range in a wide variety of body types, age and ethnic backgrounds. From college girls to MILFs, overweight to bodybuilder, there is something for everyone.
  • In-game guide hint system: If you're ever stuck on what to do next, the in-game hint system will guide you on how to progress with each girl.
  • Replay Gallery: Replay your favorite and hottest moments whenever you want.
  • Hours of Gameplay: 9 main girls, many secondary characters, 4500+ static images, 155+ animations.

Romance


It's not all about the clitty-clitty bang-bang. Experience the finer things in life with romance and fun banter.

Maledom


Spanking, public humiliation and other degenerate methods of male domination at your disposal.

Interactive World


Interact with the ladies during their day-to-day activities. Watch as they become more lewd as you further corrupt the gym.

DISCLAIMER:

Personal Trainer is a low-brow satire of adult visual novels. The premise is ridiculous, the events are as stupid as they are offensive. Any depictions of stereotypes, body-shaming and any other generally offensive material should not be perceived as a realistic reflection of society. The developer does not condone hate or disrespect towards any group of people.

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts sexual intercourse, sexual harassment, use of alcohol, references to self-harm, domestic abuse and occasional violence. There are some non-glorified references to sexual violence. There are also displays of the lowest form of stereotypes, ignorance, incompetence and a general satire of pornography.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Personal Trainer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Personal Trainer is a low-brow humorous adults only interactive Visual Novel. Your goal is to corrupt a women's only gym for your own erotic satisfaction.
